/-- An adjunction between preorder categories induces a galois connection.
-/
theorem adjunction.gc {L : «expr ⥤ » X Y} {R : «expr ⥤ » Y X} (adj : «expr ⊣ » L R) : GaloisConnection L.obj R.obj :=
  fun x y => ⟨fun h => ((adj.hom_equiv x y).to_fun h.hom).le, fun h => ((adj.hom_equiv x y).inv_fun h.hom).le⟩
#align adjunction.gc adjunction.gc
